title: Student Rental 8-10 Months Only
posting_body: ['Very Clean, fully furnished, turnkey ACADEMIC RENTAL ONLY (Maritime/Mercy College Students Welcome.)', '10 Blocks away from SUNY Maritime.', 'Beautiful apartment with glass sliding doors that lead to a private fenced-in large back yard/patio with patio furniture and barbecue grill with propane tanks.', 'One month security and one month rent to move in.', 'There is plenty of no alternate side on-street parking.', 'You can park your car and leave it for days.', "Includes gas, electric, heat, hot water, air conditioning, 2 LED TV's, cable, internet and landline phone (national calls only.)", 'Apartment available August/September 2022 thru April/May 2023 or whatever the school year calls for during these unprecedented times.', 'Principals Call (718) 822-2865.', '$1,000 per student for 4 students only.', '2 bedrooms 1.5 baths.', 'Includes all bedding, linens, towels, pots, pans, cutlery, silverware, dishware, glassware, etc.', 'Just bring your clothing and personal affects.', 'Cleaning fee applied when apartment vacated.', 'Smoke free and pet free home.', 'Rent is $4,000/month for the apartment.']
